definition: chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress

sentences.english: In the evening, Speaker Mami held a welcome banquet for Chairman Wu.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，馬米議長爲吳邦國委員長舉行了歡迎宴會。

sentences.english: Ann: In Russia, the speaker of the House proposed that mistress should be legal.
sentences.chinese: 在俄國，議長提議說二奶應該被合法。

sentences.english: With his defenses stripped, Windu was easily overpowered by Chancellor Palpatine.
sentences.chinese: 失去防禦力的溫杜被帕爾帕廷議長輕易擊敗。

sentences.english: He has coveted after the chairmanship for years.
sentences.chinese: 他覦議長職位好幾年了。

sentences.english: The Deputy Speaker took the chair.
Windu arranged a group of Jedi Masters to arrest the Chancellor.
sentences.chinese: 溫杜安排了一隊絕地大師去捉拿議長。

sentences.english: Finding a new speaker is the first task.
sentences.chinese: 首先的任務是找到一位新議長。

sentences.english: On the same day, Ukraine's Parliament Speaker Volodymyr Lytvyn met with Yang Jiechi in the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 同日，烏克蘭議長利特溫在議會大廈會見楊潔篪。

sentences.english: Malian National Assembly president to visit China.
sentences.chinese: 馬裏國民議會議長即將訪問中國。

sentences.english: China welcomes the upcoming visit by Parliamentary Presiding Officer Speaker of the Parliament Roger Abiut to China in the second half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎阿比尤特議長今年下半年訪問中國。

sentences.english: So it was that a duplicitous Chancellor took advantage of this unswerving allegiance.
sentences.chinese: 這堅定不渝的忠誠也是滿腹陰謀的議長所利用的優勢。

sentences.english: Premier Wen also met with Greek parliament speaker Philippos Petsalnikos.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶還會見了希臘議長佩察爾尼科斯。

sentences.english: President Buzek will also go to China in May.
sentences.chinese: 布澤克議長也將於5月訪華。

sentences.english: Speculation is mounting over who will run for speaker and vice speaker of the Taipei and Kaohsiung city councils .
sentences.chinese: 誰將角逐北高兩市議會正副議長寶座的臆測頻頻。

sentences.english: On the same day, Speaker Dimitris Christophias of the Cypriote Parliament also met with Li Zhaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 同日，塞浦路斯議長赫里斯託菲亞斯也會見了李肇星。

sentences.english: The House of Representatives shall choose their Speaker and other officers; and shall have the sole power of impeachment.
sentences.chinese: 衆議院選舉本院議長和其他官員，並獨自擁有彈劾權。

definition: to make a speech/to make some remarks
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
